item.description:
***Please Update your RSVP if you are attending***

This event is for anyone looking to watch the Home Opener at a great Sports Bar in the suburbs.

Scoreboard in Woburn is having a free Opening Day Party on Friday afternoon. The place was packed for Friday's road opening day viewing.

Game time is 2pm.

There are $3.00 beer specials.

There is a complimentary buffet at 3pm with popcorn, pretzels, cracker jacks and Fenway Franks.

ScoreBoard is one of the Natives favorite places to watch a game with its 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Scoreboard is located off Route 128 in Woburn next to the Showcase Cinema and Holiday Inn. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.  

Attend early or later. There is no cover. Please RSVP if attending.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess or Lauren for Reserved Table/section, E Mail other Yes RSVPs to coordinate
item.why: Jon Mason forgot to make Lauren at ScoreBoard an Assistant Organizer so she could post this and invite us.
item.name: Red Sox Home Opening Day 2011 Party & Game Watching at ScoreBoard in Woburn
